title: Found: The wild Loris Klin concept bike hints at a fully integrated bikepacking future
content:
What does the future of bikepacking look like? Well, if Loris’ Project Klin is any indication, it will be a lot more integrated. As their entry for the 2021 Concours de Machines, Loris took this year’s bikepacking theme and truly ran with it, coming up with this incredible concept bike in the process. While the

The post Found: The wild Loris Klin concept bike hints at a fully integrated bikepacking future appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
